description:
We have big ideas in the pipeline for Maths Camps and for our ongoing visits to schools and improving the infrastructure of maths education. 

We are always keen to hear from potential volunteers to join our summer camps in Africa or help throughout the year.

If you would like to make a donation to any of our project we would be very grateful.
text: Volunteer to join a maths summer camp in Africa
title: Get Involved
